level-1.audioText: If there is a rock in the center, go toward the rock. Otherwise, go to the left.

level-2.audioText: If you see a tree, go to the tree's right side. If there's a fence, go to the fence's left side. Otherwise, go to the center.

level-3.audioText: If there's a rock in the center, go toward the rock. Otherwise, go to the left.

level-4.audioText: If there is a fence, go toward the fence. If there is a rock, go to the rock's left side. Otherwise, go to the center.

level-5.audioText: If there is a rock, go to the rock's right side. Otherwise, go to the center.

level-6.audioText: If there is a tree, go to the tree's left side. If there is a rock, go to the rock's right side. Otherwise, go to the center.

level-7.audioText: If there is a tree in the center, go toward the tree. If there is a fence, go to the fence's left side. Otherwise, go to the center.

level-8.audioText: If there is a fence in the center, go toward the fence. If there is a rock to the right, go to the rock's left side. Otherwise, go to the center.

level-9.audioText: If there is a rock on the left, go toward the rock. If there is a tree, go to the tree's right side. Otherwise, go to the center.

level-10.audioText: If there is a rock, tree, and fence together, go toward the fence. If there is only a tree, go to the tree's left side. Otherwise, go to the center.
